item.title: Narrator for Youtube videos - Upwork
item.description:
### Example:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1gaKnj3UrM

### Role:

Looking for a youthful and energetic Voice-Over Artist to narrate our videos. The ideal candidate should have a voice that resonates with the young American audience.

### Responsibilities:

- Provide engaging and clear voice-over narrations.
- Work closely with scriptwriters and editors, when needed, to achieve the desired tone and pace.
- Deliver high-quality audio recordings within deadlines.
- Adapt voice style to suit different video themes.

### Requirements:

- Fast delivery times, 24-48h
- Experience in voice-over, particularly in documentary or entertainment genres.
- A youthful, dynamic voice that appeals to a young audience.
- Ability to convey emotion and energy through voice.
- High-quality recording equipment or access to a studio.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 22, 2024 17:09 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Narration, Voice-Over, US English Dialect, Young Adult
Skills: Narration, Voice-Over, US English Dialect, Young Adult
Country: Brazil
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Look for creative YouTube thumbnail creator. Link yo channel is https://youtu.be/Qklki90pS9Q?si=2G1Z295EHB2LPgUQ We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team and help produce high-quality, engaging YouTube videos. Link to channel is https://youtu.be/Qklki90pS9Q?si=GdGF-PEjRepz0jA1 The ideal candidate will have experience editing videos for YouTube, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work collaboratively to bring our vision to life.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit and assemble recorded footage into polished, engaging YouTube videos
- Add graphics, titles, music, and other elements to enhance the videos
- Ensure the final product meets our quality standards and is delivered on time
- Collaborate with our content team to develop and execute creative ideas
- Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing trends and techniques

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for YouTube content
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve)
- Strong understanding of YouTube’s algorithm and best practices for video content
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with motion graphics and animation
- Knowledge of sound design and audio editing
- Familiarity with social media platforms and content creation

**To Apply:**

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A link to your portfolio or examples of your previous work
2. A brief description of your editing process and tools you use
3. Your availability and typical turnaround time for a 10-15 minute video
4. Your rate per hour or per project

We look forward to seeing your work and potentially collaborating with you on our YouTube channel!
We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team and help produce high-quality, engaging YouTube videos. Link to channel is https://youtu.be/Qklki90pS9Q?si=GdGF-PEjRepz0jA1 The ideal candidate will have experience editing videos for YouTube, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work collaboratively to bring our vision to life.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit and assemble recorded footage into polished, engaging YouTube videos
- Add graphics, titles, music, and other elements to enhance the videos
- Ensure the final product meets our quality standards and is delivered on time

- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics

2. A brief description of your editing process and tools you use
3. Your availability and typical turnaround time for a 10-15 minute video
4. Your rate per hour or per project

We look forward to seeing your work and potentially collaborating with you on our YouTube channel!
We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team and help produce high-quality, engaging YouTube videos. Link to channel is https://youtu.be/Qklki90pS9Q?si=GdGF-PEjRepz0jA1 The ideal candidate will have experience editing videos for YouTube, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work collaboratively to bring our vision to life.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit and assemble recorded footage into polished, engaging YouTube videos
- Add graphics, titles, music, and other elements to enhance the videos
- Ensure the final product meets our quality standards and is delivered on time
- Collaborate with our content team to develop and execute creative ideas
- Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing trends and techniques

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for YouTube content
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve)
- Strong understanding of YouTube’s algorithm and best practices for video content
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with motion graphics and animation
- Knowledge of sound design and audio editing
- Familiarity with social media platforms and content creation

**To Apply:**

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A link to your portfolio or examples of your previous work
2. A brief description of your editing process and tools you use
3. Your availability and typical turnaround time for a 10-15 minute video
4. Your rate per hour or per project

We look forward to seeing your work and potentially collaborating with you on our YouTube channel!


We are looking for a talented and imaginative graphic designer to create eye-catching YouTube thumbnails that attract viewers and boost our click-through rates. Link to channel is We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team and help produce high-quality, engaging YouTube videos. Link to channel is https://youtu.be/Qklki90pS9Q?si=GdGF-PEjRepz0jA1 The ideal candidate will have experience editing videos for YouTube, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work collaboratively to bring our vision to life.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit and assemble recorded footage into polished, engaging YouTube videos
- Add graphics, titles, music, and other elements to enhance the videos
- Ensure the final product meets our quality standards and is delivered on time
- Collaborate with our content team to develop and execute creative ideas
- Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing trends and techniques

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor, specifically for YouTube content
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve)
- Strong understanding of YouTube’s algorithm and best practices for video content
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with motion graphics and animation
- Knowledge of sound design and audio editing
- Familiarity with social media platforms and content creation

**To Apply:**

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A link to your portfolio or examples of your previous work
2. A brief description of your editing process and tools you use
3. Your availability and typical turnaround time for a 10-15 minute video
4. Your rate per hour or per project

We look forward to seeing your work and potentially collaborating with you on our YouTube channel!
The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of thumbnails, an understanding of YouTube trends, and the ability to produce designs that align with our brand’s style and message.

**Responsibilities:**

- Design compelling and visually appealing thumbnails for our YouTube videos
- Ensure each thumbnail accurately represents the video content and entices viewers to click
- Collaborate with our content team to understand the themes and objectives of each video
- Stay updated with the latest design trends and techniques specific to YouTube thumbnails
- Deliver high-quality thumbnails in a timely manner, adhering to our upload schedule

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a graphic designer, with a focus on YouTube thumbnails
- Proficient in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator)
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling and composition
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Attention to detail and a creative mindset

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with video editing and creating other YouTube-related graphics
- Knowledge of YouTube SEO and best practices for optimizing thumbnails
- Familiarity with our content niche and audience preferences

**To Apply:**

Please provide the following with your application:

1. A link to your portfolio showcasing your previous YouTube thumbnail designs
2. A brief description of your design process and tools you use
3. Your availability and typical turnaround time for a batch of thumbnails
4. Your rate per thumbnail or per project

We are excited to see your work and potentially work together to enhance our YouTube channel’s visual appeal!

Hourly Range: $17.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 17:03 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Photo Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Develop a XAPI training program from 2, two hour videos and a powerpoint - Upwork
item.description:
I have recorded a live presentation taking about 2 hours from two different camera views a have a powerpoint that I want to produce into a training course.

The work would include editing the videos and powerpoint to show different shots, and views while showing the powerpoint as well.

I would make this into a training program that will need to be in Xapi (and maybe a MP4 video) format for a learning management system.

I would work with you to make this a high quality training program.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Training Presentation, Video Editing
Skills: Training Presentation, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey I am looking for someone to edit the first 28 videos of my upcoming unreal engine tutorial courses.

You will be editing unreal engine tutorial videos.

Each video is between 3- 10 minutes long

For the editing you need to do the following
1. Remove any loud background noises and make the audio clear
2. Cut any parts where I cough or make any louds noises
3. Cut out long silent pauses, sometimes I am thinking and there is a pause
4. Cut out if I make an mistakes and i redo a part.
5. You will need to add my into video which I will provide to you at the start and end of every video

The videos should be made as soon as you can although its fine if its take a bit longer, just please ensure quality is good



Budget: $80
Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: TikTok editor for costplusapi.com Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an unhinged TikTok editor to suggest and edit content that will ultimately promote  website, costplusapi.com. As a content support and editor , you will be responsible for producing engaging TikTok videos that showcase the benefits and features of our platform. The goal is to attract a wider audience and drive traffic to our website.

  Required skills:
  - Proficient in TikTok video editing techniques
  - Strong creativity and storytelling abilities
  - Familiarity with current TikTok trends and challenges
  - Experience in promoting brands or products through TikTok

We are looking for a TikTok editor expert who can bring fresh ideas and viral potential to our promotional efforts. Join our team and contribute to the success of costplusapi.com!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:32 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Marketing, Internet Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Marketing, Internet Marketing
Country: Germany

item.title: Video Editor for a Personal Brand YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
My name is Ovi, and I'm a YouTube Strategist.

My client is looking for a video editor for her YouTube channel.

She already has a 13k subscriber channel, but we want to start another project, meaning a brand new channel. I care A LOT about her, and hopefully, I'll be able to find somebody worthy of her. :)

Before applying for this job, please be aware that a trial may be involved before we decide with whom we'll be moving forward.

Another sort of warning...write "salut" at the beginning of your proposal, is to make sure that you'll respect any corrections we want to make to the video the first time, without us having to repeat ourselves multiple times. Based on my experience, I find this the most annoying thing an editor can do.

Her style of editing will be really LIGHT and soft. Although she provided a reference for editing, I don't think we'll ever be at that volume of editing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TvgfzI7rFYU.

If you submit a proposal, I'll send you brand guidelines, her channel, etc., and we'll discuss rates, possible trials, and your experience.

I've worked with a lot of editors in the last couple of years, and even I edited videos back in the day. This isn't anything complicated, but we do require attention to detail and good taste.

Thank you.

Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects

My client is looking for a video editor for her YouTube channel.

She already has a 13k subscriber channel, but we want to start another project, meaning a brand new channel. I care A LOT about her, and hopefully, I'll be able to find somebody worthy of her. :)

Before applying for this job, please be aware that a trial may be involved before we decide with whom we'll be moving forward.

Another sort of warning...write "salut" at the beginning of your proposal, is to make sure that you'll respect any corrections we want to make to the video the first time, without us having to repeat ourselves multiple times. Based on my experience, I find this the most annoying thing an editor can do.

Her style of editing will be really LIGHT and soft. Although she provided a reference for editing, I don't think we'll ever be at that volume of editing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TvgfzI7rFYU.

If you submit a proposal, I'll send you brand guidelines, her channel, etc., and we'll discuss rates, possible trials, and your experience.

I've worked with a lot of editors in the last couple of years, and even I edited videos back in the day. This isn't anything complicated, but we do require attention to detail and good taste.

item.title: Video Editor for Spiritual Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,
We are seeking talented video editors for our spiritual-based YouTube channel. Here are the details:

* Video length: 20-25 minutes each
* Provided Materials: Script, voice-over
* Frequency: 5 videos per week
* Potential opportunity for permanent work
*Per video 25$ pay, videos are simple to edit. If you are not able to make 5 videos per week, do not apply.

Example channels:
https://www.youtube.com/@PowerthatisInsideYou/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@EyeofWisdom87/videos


Requirements:

Turnaround Time: 24-36 hours per video
We need someone with quick response times

Skills: Strong understanding of storytelling and YouTube audience retention
To increase your chances of being hired, please submit relevant samples of your spirituality based style editing work.

Will hire someone today. I will only consider hiring you if you add relevant samples to your message.



Budget: $25

item.title: Need to create a motion capture dance video just like the "Just Dance" game - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to create a  "Just Dance" style video like the link shown here, but with our own song and choreography - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=apCGFVBm6JM

Im looking to the experts to determine how to create this and what is needed.  
We have tried a few different things.  A motion capture option as well as full animation but neither has ended up in the realm of what we need.  You can see an example here.
We essentially want our video to look like its from the game. So we will need the video effects and proper application of the dancer and visuals.
This is why we need your help!
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tP35W0GTni4_77gC-dn6D36J6dxBElJf/view?usp=sharing

The song we are using is the same as the once in the provided example that didn't achieve the goal.

I'd like to end up with something that feels just like the familiar Just Dance game style videos that people can dance along with.

We are looking for someone that we can hire for multiple projects, starting with this small one to get a feel for the process and timelines.
Please let me know your best offer for pricing and timeline (we 'd like this done ASAP)

Thanks!





Posted On: June 22, 2024 16:25 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Character Design
Skills: Motion Graphics, Character Design
Country: Canada
click to apply
